a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Population by country, available from 10,000 BCE to 2023, based on data and estimates from different sources.
Data source: HYDE (2023); Gapminder (2022); UN WPP (2024)
Note: Historical country data is shown based on today's geographical borders.
